widget.name: Dynamic Image Viewer
widget.description: Displays an image using a dynamic or static URL

property.caption: Image URL
property.description: This image will be shown if the image cannot be found, is loading or if the image attribute is not defined. For example: 'http://mydomain.com/images/img=loading.png&thumb=true'.

property.caption: Image attribute
property.description: If set, this fields provides the image URL of an image. This property overrides the Image URL property. The final URL (src) of the image then becomes <Path prefix><Image attribute value><Path postfix;>

property.caption: Path prefix
property.description: If set, this path will be prefixed before the image URL. For example 'http://mydomain.com/images/img='

property.caption: Path postfix
property.description: If set, this path will be append after the image URL. For example '.png&thumb=true'

property.caption: Width
property.description: Maximum width of the image in pixels.

property.caption: Height
property.description: Maximum height of the image in pixels.

property.caption: Alt Caption
property.description: Alternative caption which will be shown when the image cannot be loaded.

property.caption: Click Action
property.description: This microflow will be invoked when the image is clicked. The return value is ignored.

property.caption: Link attribute
property.description: This fields provides the URL of the website which should be opened when the image is clicked. For example: 'http://mydomain.com/home'

property.caption: Link target
property.description: Defines where the link (see Link attribute) should be opened.

enumerationValues.enumerationValue: Open in new page or tab

property.caption: Tooltip attribute
property.description: This attribute will be used as the tooltip hover text for the image.
